description.narrative: The GCF Readiness project focuses on two areas: 1. Establishing and strengthening the proposed National Designated Authority (NDA) and Focal Point), and 2 (Development of a Strategic Framework)

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: 1.1 Capacity to coordinate across stakeholders and facilitate effective consultation and communication 1.2 Knowledge on climate and finance priorities strengthened 1.3 System for reviewing proposals and issuing recommendations (or no-objections) established 1.4 Capacity and systems to monitor, evaluate and report on the activities of the Fund and other relevant finance mechanisms and institutions established 1.5 Information, including in local languages, on procedures of the Fund to disseminated to country stakeholders

comment.narrative: NDA/focal point lead effective coordination mechanism • No objection procedure established and implemented • Stakeholders engages in consultative processes • Stakeholder consultations conducted with equal representation of women • Bilateral agreements between the country and the GCF executed • Monitoring, oversight and streamlining of climate finance • Country programmes, including adaptation priorities, developed and continuously updated • Annual participatory review of GCF portfolio in the country organized

Outcome 1: - NDA Structure developed - NDA capacity development startegy finalized - NDA TOR developed and included in the GCF project manual. - Development of SCCF ToR - No-objection proceedure was finalised and approved by the NDA focal point - SCCF ToR was finalized and included in the manual. - A Facebook page for NDA to raise public awareness on NDA roles and mandates, sharing of information through social media was created. - NDA website was developed and hosted under a government domain.(www.nda.gov.tl) - Development and publication of public brochures - Stakeholder engagement strategy - Strategic framework for engagement with GCF - M&E training conducted to potential NDA staff and partners - Country assessment report finalized. - Mechanism of screening, prioritizing and recommending proposals completed.
Outcome 2: - GCF manual development: -Vision for Climate Investment - Background Information on the Green Climate Fund - Institutional Arrangements for Climate Finance - National Climate Investment Priorities - National Project Development Process – Roles & Responsibilities - National Project Development Process – Step by Step Guide - Project Development Templates - Country coordination mechanisms and multi- stakeholders’ engagement for country consultation - Country coordination and stakeholder consultation
- Country program framework - Stocktaking of investment priorities and develop assessment criteria - Investment priority criteria developed - Strategic investment priorities - Mapping of activities under key priorities using investment criteria - Assist in decision-making on investment priorities - Mechanism for mainstreaming climate change into national policies - As part of the GCF project development methodology, a three-step project idea process has been designed. This enables increased oversight and control by the Government of Timor-Leste by: 1) ensuring that concept notes cannot be unilaterally prepared by accredited entities and presented to the Government 2). ensuring that GCF projects will only be developed for the Government’s highest priorities. - the evaluation form of the GCF concept note included gender equality consideration in the project design, which was incorporated into the consultation process. - Accreditation requirements and potential gaps in proposed NIE - Project proposal development process map - Templates, checklist and brochures development
